articles.description: Actor Amit Sadh took to Twitter to inform fans that he had tested negative for Covid-19. He had recently been seen in Abhishek Bachchan and Nithya Menen starrer Breathe Into The Shadows web series.

articles.title: Kelly Preston, actor and wife of John Travolta, dies at 57 of breast cancer - Hindustan Times
articles.description: John Travolta’s actor wife Kelly Preston has died. She was 57 years old and had been battling breast cancer.
articles.content:
Kelly Preston, who played dramatic and comic foil to actors ranging from Tom Cruise in Jerry Maguire to Arnold Schwarzenegger in Twins, died Sunday, husband John Travolta said. She was 57.
